Question
========

A sample of 6 people is taken from a population of asthma patients, and 
their vital lung capacity (in liters) is measured, with the following 
results: 2.47, 2.25, 2.65, 2.00, 3.41, 2.22. This variable is measured at:

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level
* Ordinal measurement level
* Interval measurement level
* Ratio measurement level

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Nominal measurement level: Incorrect
* Ordinal measurement level: Incorrect
* Interval measurement level: Incorrect
* Ratio measurement level: Correct
